titles.title: The King Is Coming, The King Is Coming

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
The King is coming. The King is coming.
I can hear the trumpet sounding,
And His face I now can see.
The King is coming. The King is coming.
Praise the Lord, He is coming in me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
El Rey ya viene, El Rey ya viene,
La trompeta esta sonando y Su rostro puedo ver.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
El Rey ya viene, el Rey ya viene,
Gloria a Dios, El viene en mi.
